0.text: Innate: Zilean generates  2 / 3.5 / 5 / 6 / 12 (based on level) experience (does not count towards his own level up) every 5 seconds. Time in a Bottle is on cooldown when the game starts and becomes disabled when Zilean reaches level 18.

1.text: When the amount stored is enough to level up an allied  champion and Zilean has been out of combat with enemy  champions and  turrets in the last 10 seconds, he can select a target allied champion to initiate a 1.2 second  channel which starts after a 0.5-second cast time and is also  interrupted if Zilean enters combat with enemy champions or turrets.If the channel is  interrupted, Time in a Bottle goes on a 10 second  cooldown, reduced to 1 second if Zilean interrupted it himself.

2.text: A successful channel levels up the target and rewards Zilean the granted amount of  experience for himself as well.

0.text: Active: Zilean throws a ticking time bomb to the target location that grants  sight of its surroundings and detonates after 3 seconds, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies.

1.text: The bomb will attach itself to units hit directly, or those who move within a small radius of its center while it is on the ground,  revealing them and detonating at their location when the duration ends, or immediately when they die.

2.text: The bomb detonates immediately if another bomb attaches itself to the same unit,  stunning all nearby enemies for a duration.

0.text: Active: Zilean reduces  Time Bomb's and  Time Warp's  cooldowns by 10 seconds each.
Active: Zilean bends time around the target champion,  slowing them for 2.5 seconds if they are an enemy or granting them  bonus movement speed for the same duration if they are an ally or himself.
Active: Zilean places a protective time rune on the target allied  champion or himself for 5 seconds.

1.text: If the target takes  fatal damage in the duration, they enter  resurrection for 3 seconds, during which they are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and  unable to act, and are afterwards  healed.

Active: Zilean bends time around the target champion,  slowing them for 2.5 seconds if they are an enemy or granting them  bonus movement speed for the same duration if they are an ally or himself.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Frostfang, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants  20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Inspire: Grants you and allies within 1000 radius of you 30% bonus movement speed for 4 seconds (75 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – INSPIRE: Grants you and allies within 1000 radius of you 30% bonus movement speed for 4 seconds (75 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Motivate: Healing, shielding, or buffing an allied champion (excluding yourself) grants you both 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds (4 (per champion) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MOTIVATE:  Healing,  shielding, or buffing an allied champion (excluding yourself) grants you both 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds (4 (per champion) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Healing or shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 60% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
